projects.title: Solar-Powered Water Pumps Installation - Sidama Region
projects.description: Ministry of Agriculture project for solar-powered water pump installations at 16 sites in Sidama Region.
projects.fullDescription: Sub-contract project with Ministry of Agriculture for supply, installation, testing, commissioning, and training of solar-powered water pumps at 16 sites in Sidama Region. The project is currently 90% complete with comprehensive farmer training and system maintenance support.

testimonial.name: Regional Coordinator
testimonial.text: The project has been transformative for our region. The community engagement approach has ensured long-term success and farmer adoption.

testimonial.text: The team's ability to complete this project in just one week while navigating border region challenges was impressive and demonstrates their professional capabilities.

projects.title: Groundbreaking Solar Water Lifting Partnership: Comprehensive Irrigation Development Project in Shoa Robit, Ethiopia
projects.description: Partnership project with Nahom Construction for comprehensive solar-powered water lifting systems, pipeline construction, and irrigation development in Shoa Robit.
projects.fullDescription: Nahom Construction Pvt. Ltd. Co. and Agri-sun Ethiopia Engineering and Trading Pvt. Ltd. Co. have joined forces to implement a comprehensive project focused on the supply, installation, and commissioning of solar-powered water lifting devices. This project also encompasses the construction of pipelines and canals to facilitate irrigation and household water supply.
challenges: Coordination between construction and solar teams
solutions: Strategic partnership with local construction expertise
results: Completed mobilization of water tankers and irrigation pipes
Successful manufacturing and installation of PV modules
Ongoing canal excavation with community labor
Workshop testing completed for solar pumping systems
technologies: Irrigation and household water supply systems

testimonial.name: Project Manager
testimonial.text: The collaboration between Nahom Construction and Agri-Sun Ethiopia has been exceptional. Despite challenges, we're making significant progress in bringing sustainable water solutions to Shoa Robit.

projects.title: Sustainable Solar Irrigation Success: Advanced Rainmaker 2C Solar Pump Installation Project in Sidama Region, Ethiopia
projects.description: Solar pump installation project in Sidama region providing irrigation solutions to 10 farmers in Hawassa Zuria zone with comprehensive farmer data and GPS coordinates.
projects.fullDescription: This project in Sidama National Regional State involves the installation of Rainmaker 2C solar pumps with battery backup systems. The project serves 10 farmers across Galo Argisa kebele, providing sustainable irrigation solutions with detailed farmer profiling and geographical mapping.

testimonial.name: Ayele Adamo
testimonial.text: The solar pump has transformed my farming. I can now irrigate my crops consistently and have seen significant improvements in my harvest.

projects.title: Empowering Farmers in Southern Ethiopia: Agricultural Transformation Institute's Solar Pump Initiative in SNNP Region
projects.description: Agricultural Transformation Institute project in SNNP region installing Rainmaker 2C solar pumps without battery backup for 6 beneficiary farmers.
projects.fullDescription: This project, sponsored by the Agricultural Transformation Institute, involves the installation of Rainmaker 2C solar pumps without battery backup systems across multiple locations in the SNNP region. The project focuses on providing sustainable irrigation solutions to enhance agricultural productivity.

testimonial.name: Murad Kedir
testimonial.text: This solar pump project has made a real difference in our agricultural output. The reliable water supply has helped us increase our crop yields significantly.

projects.title: Transforming Agriculture in Northern Ethiopia: Precision Solar Pump Deployment in Amhara Region's Awi Zone
projects.description: Agricultural Transformation Institute project in Amhara region installing Rainmaker 2C solar pumps for farmers in Injibara woreda with detailed GPS mapping.
projects.fullDescription: This initiative by the Agricultural Transformation Institute focuses on deploying Rainmaker 2C solar pumps without battery backup systems to farmers in the Awi zone of Amhara region, specifically in Injibara woreda. The project includes comprehensive GPS mapping and farmer profiling.

testimonial.name: Getachew Mekonen
testimonial.text: The solar pump has revolutionized our farming practices. We now have consistent water access throughout the year, leading to better crop yields and improved livelihoods.

projects.title: Advanced Hober Solar Pump Technology: Revolutionizing Irrigation in Tigray Region's Maychew Woreda, Ethiopia
projects.description: Agricultural Transformation Institute project installing Hober solar pumps in Tigray region for enhanced irrigation capabilities and agricultural productivity.
projects.fullDescription: This project, supported by the Agricultural Transformation Institute, involves the installation of Hober solar pumps across multiple locations in the L/Maychew woreda of Tigray region. The initiative aims to provide reliable irrigation solutions to improve agricultural productivity and farmer livelihoods.

testimonial.name: Zeray G/maryam
testimonial.text: The Hober solar pump has been a game-changer for our farming. We now have reliable irrigation throughout the year, which has significantly improved our crop yields.

projects.title: Scaling Solar Success: Phase Two Hober Solar Pump Expansion Project in Tigray Region, Ethiopia
projects.description: Second phase of Hober solar pump installations in Tigray region, expanding irrigation access to additional farmers in Maychew woreda.
projects.fullDescription: This second phase of the Hober solar pump project continues the successful implementation in Tigray region, providing additional farmers in L/Maychew woreda with reliable solar-powered irrigation solutions. The project builds on the success of the first phase and extends benefits to more agricultural communities.

testimonial.name: Kbra Gebrhet
testimonial.text: As a woman farmer, this solar pump has given me independence in managing my farm irrigation. I can now plan my crops better and have more control over my agricultural activities.
